title: Drawing, "Design for top frame of a harp", 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash on gray-tan laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink, left, written horizontally: profils et face d'une arp avunque un pallemeur (the end of last words is under an erasure).
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: The front view is shown inside the side view. A palm wrapped with a garland supports a volute which is decorated with registers of leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for top frame of a harp", 1780.
1780. Pen and black ink, brush and wash on gray-tan laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-192.
